name: Y-RBG
description:
You have lost your dog and need to find him. But it's difficult to come there - only the colors can help you. When they disappear you will fall and the game is lost.
The colors will appear and disapper in a regular basis, following the rhythm of the music. You need to plan your way in advance and stick to the rhythm, to reach your dog.
There are different difficulties: more calls, faster music, or a larger field to cross.

https://github.com/Brutlex/LevelOne
